channel.title: Just wondering... How could I do this, if anyone knows, please help me out
channel.description:
Ok, I would add this myself but I can't find the files with the golden admin crown.. Heres what I want to do. I want to edit the look on crowns, just for playerrights=3, (owner) and leave 2 the same old gold crown. Now what i want to do with the owner's crown is change it to look more attractive and notticable, like this ~~
[IMG]http://i97.photobucket.com/albums/l234/thorvaldian/ownerbullet.jpg[/img]
Does anybody know how to do it? I've never seen it on a server but I know it's possible... coders finding out how to do it would be greatly appreciated^.^ If anyone knows, can you tell me how and where i put in my picture? thanks :D[br][size=1]Posted on: May 06, 2007, 08:02:15 PM[/size][hr]Oh yea, and Killfrog I don't care for your comments. You must have too much time on your hands to spend this much time spamming tons of threads..

item.title: Just wondering... How could I do this, if anyone knows, please help me out
item.dc:creator: @Play_N_Skillz Play N Skillz
item.description:
@Play_N_Skillz wrote:

He’s right, its client side. Very easy to do. You just edit your sprites with the crowns in them.

Read full topic
